rukus.text: 14|35|Dangshi, yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi zhege difang bian cheng anquan de, qiu ni shi wo he wo de zisun, yuanli ouxiang chongbai.
14|36|Wo de zhu a! Ouxiangmen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu. Shei shuncong wo, ta que shi wo de tong jiao; shei weikang wo, name, ni shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

14|37|Women de zhu a! Wo que yi shi wo de bufen houyi zhu zai yige meiyou zhuangjia de shangu li, zhu zai ni de jin fang fujin——women de zhu a!——Yibian tamen jin shou bai gong, qiu ni shi yibufen ren de xin yilian tamen, qiu ni yi yibufen guoshi gongji tamen, yibian tamen ganxie
14|38|women de zhu a! Ni biding zhidao women suo yinhui de he women suo biaobai de. Tiandi jian meiyou she me shiwu neng manguo an la.
14|39|Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta zai wo laomai de shihou, shangci wo yi sima yi he yi si ha ge. Wo de zhu que shi tingqu qidao de.
14|40|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo he yibufen houyi jin shou bai gong. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni jieshou wo de qidao.
14|41|Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai qingsuan zhi ri raoshu wo he wo de shuangqin he xinshimen.”
